Talks

Talks by categories in reversed chronological order.

2019

  1. Surface roughness enhanced adhesion in elastic contact Deng, Weilin 56th Annual Technical Meeting of the Society of Engineering Science, St. Louis, MO, October 13, 2019

2018

  1. Surface roughness dependent adhesion: Finite element modelling and analysis Deng, Weilin ASME’s International Mechanical Engineering Congress and Exposition (IMECE) 2018, Pittsburgh, PA, November 14, 2018
  2. Is surface roughness Good or Bad for adhesion? Deng, Weilin 9th Annual NEW.Mech Conference, Brown University, Providence, RI, September 29, 2018
  3. Surface roughness dependent adhesion: Finite element modelling and analysis Deng, Weilin 18th U.S. National Congress for Theoretical and Applied Mechanics–Jointly Organized with the Chinese Society of Theoretical and Applied Mechanics, Chicago, IL, June 08, 2018

2017

  1. Theoretical modeling of depth dependent hysteresis in adhesive elastic contact Deng, Weilin 54th Annual Technical Meeting of the Society of Engineering Science, Northeastern University, Boston, MA, July 28, 2017

2016

  1. Depth dependent hysteresis in adhesive elastic contacts for large surface roughness Deng, Weilin 53rd Annual Technical Meeting of the Society of Engineering Science, University of Maryland, College Park, MD, October 04, 2016
